step_zh: 用蘸有澄清石灰水的烧杯罩在火焰上，观察石灰水变化
step_en: Cover the flame with a beaker containing clear limewater and observe the changes in the limewater
clip_video_path: /path/to/chemistry/ch_67/video/02-一氧化碳的燃烧/02-一氧化碳的燃烧_step_4.mp4
subject: chemistry

annotations.text: 用一支内壁蘸有澄清的石灰水
annotations.text_en: Use a beaker coated with clear limewater on its inner wall

annotations.text: 烧杯罩在火焰上观察过一会儿
annotations.text_en: Cover the flame with the beaker and observe after a moment

annotations.text: 烧杯壁上澄清的石灰水变浑浊
annotations.text_en: The clear limewater on the beaker's wall turns cloudy
